Class: DataForm

WinJSContrib.UI. DataForm

This control enhance data form management by adding validation mecanism and form state helpers. It must be placed on a form element. Input fields must use WinJSContrib.UI.DataFormBinding to bind object properties to input

new DataForm(element, options)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
element HTMLElement

DOM element containing the control
options Object
